response.original_title: Suara dari Sudut Kelas: Sayap Garuda
response.overview: Allana, a student who transfers to Sukma Middle School with her father, Mr. Wahyu, begins to face new dynamics. At school, she faces bullying from several students, including Kenzi, a quiet student who participates in the pencak silat extracurricular and excels at it. Allana and Kenzi learn many life lessons from pencak silat, that true strength does not come from physical strength, but from the heart that wants to protect and continue to advance in defending the truth.
response.title: Suara dari Sudut Kelas: Sayap Garuda
